website_summaries.verdict: A racing-style office chair that can also be used for gaming and has many of the same features as traditional gaming chairs.
pros: Includes adjustable height, conventional tilt, padded arm rests, and a thick padded seat
cons: Doesn't offer as many adjustable features as some other gaming chairs and the screws strip easily when assembling

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this chair to my friend
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, nicely packaged. Instructions are so clear so don't be afraid of assembling it. Multiple functions. I can adjust the height or the position as what I want. It is a major upgrade from my old office chair. It feels comfortable when I took a nap in it this afternoon. Form it's quality to it's appearance, and to it's price, I can't say anything bad now. Really nice price and worth it to pay the money for. Would recommend this chair to my friend.
customer_reviews.author: YESICA M MONTOYA CARMONA

customer_reviews.title: Beyond my expectations
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are nice and clear for this chair. I spent less than 10 minutes assembling the parts together. It's so easy for me. I found this chair to be very comfortable. I sit in front of computer for long period of time and this chair has the support I need to help with lower back issues. It was a HUGE upgrade from the previous chair so this is luxurious. LOVE THIS CHAIR 100% recommend. Really good price as well not too expensive compared to other chairs.
customer_reviews.author: MELVIN HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The back support broke on me durring the first week of use. I'm only 6ft, 180 pounds. For a chair like this, rated to hold up 250 is a whole lot of false advertising. I dont know what is going on with what's inside the chair but once whatever snaps inside of it, itll make a squeaking sound like no other. 2 generous stars because of the refund. Wouldnt give the product any stars.
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: Seems decent
customer_reviews.text: We have had this chair for a couple months and it is comfortable and very reasonably priced, we however have not been able to figure out where the squeak in this come from and you can’t move an inch of the squeaking be heard in the next room, so that would be a star off
customer_reviews.author: scubaman929

customer_reviews.title: We have tried several other chairs but this one is perfect for our budget and his needs
customer_reviews.text: My husband spends hours at his desk and he has back issues. We have tried several other chairs but this one is perfect for our budget and his needs.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Not great but okay.
customer_reviews.text: Husband uses the chair to game on his computer. He said the assembly was easy and that it’s okay for gaming. He does have a complaint about support. It’s not as comfortable as he thought it would be. Doesn’t provide as much support as he wanted. In his words “feels like a normal chair”. We got the red color and we haven’t seen any rips or anything. We’ve had it for about 6 months and he uses it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money but not very adjustable
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with this chair is that it doesn’t have enough range of adjustment. Basically it reclines and goes up and down. My old chair had adjustable arm rests so I could keep the chair seat at a certain height and lower the arm rests so I could still slide under my desk. Also while you can recline the back, you can’t tilt the seat so it felt like I was sliding forward.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: It's not the best but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Pros - looks nice in the background when I'm streaming & supports my lower back. Cons - 1) The blue color on the wheels is different than the blue on the actual chair. 2) The chair leans forward so it feels like I'm slowly falling towards my screen. Definitely manufacturer error and not because of the way I put it together lol 3) It squeaks whenever I get off/on the seat or if I adjust my seating position so that's annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Tiara

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, beautiful, easy to assemble, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and put it together myself, took about 30min and was fairly easy to do. I did have to attach one of the arms to the back instead of the seat though because the bolt holes were a bit far into the piece. The color is gorgeous and he absolutely loved it, sits in it for hours at a time while gaming with no problems. An absolute steal for the price, so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great chair.
customer_reviews.text: The chair arrived early and in excellent condition. Directions were adequate and assembly was not too difficult with two people. It would have been much more difficult with one. The chair is comfortable and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Bert76

customer_reviews.title: Okay chair but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This chair is fine for gaming for a teenage boy. My biggest complaint is that the left arm of the chair has never been sturdy from the beginning and completely snapped off after less than 2 months of use. I have contacted the company and received no response. I'll update this review if the company responds and makes it right.
customer_reviews.author: Pauleen D Orme

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for any time at a desk
customer_reviews.text: Really love this gaming chair! I consider myself a gamer and spending even a few hours on some chairs really messes up my back. This chair really saves me the discomfort with both support for my back and neck. It's really adjustable for comfort and adapts to any desk. I really like how it completes my desk with its black and blue color. I use it for studying as well as gaming and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Shivani S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Great chair to sit on while I'm doing homework, playing video games, or just kicking back and watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: We got this chair for my son for his Christmas with a desk to match. He loves the chair. I put it together after he went to be Christmas Eve and it only took be about 30 minutes. Directions were easy to follow and I was easily able to do it by myself. He's had no problems with the chair and loves the recline option and has even fallen asleep in it a couple of times lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok with the seat held up better
customer_reviews.text: This chair is not bad but as I have found with most chairs over time the seat is starting to mash down a little (I weigh around 240lbs) as I do spend a lot of time in it. I have had other chairs fair far worse and it's still comfortable but I don notice it's not quite a cushiony as it once was.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Moore

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES this Chair
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son as part of a graduation gift & he absolutely loves it. We had a little trouble lowering at first but figured it out. Was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: sj

customer_reviews.title: a huge hassle to assemble & one leg is severely damaged
customer_reviews.text: it took almost 2 hrs with another person to get this chair together. the screws don't grab well so one person has to hold & push pieces while the other tries to get the screws to catch. In addition, after we got it all together, I found out that one of the legs is damaged. It's missing 1/2 the plastic & the jagged edges cut my foot. The back cushion is great. Butt cushion is barely padded & not comfortable for an extended sit.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Vecchio

customer_reviews.title: Merax Gaming chair great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son for Christmas. He loves it! It is pretty impressive for the price. It’s very sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kim D

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Took a shot on this chair because it was reasonably priced and my son likes the colors. Came super fast and the instructions for assembly were clear. Only issue I had was lining up the screws from the back of the chair to the armrest. I don't love the way that part came together but it holds my weight and my son's just fine. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Blair

customer_reviews.title: Quality as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old loves this chair! He loves that he can control the height and the reclining back. The product feels very sturdy, impressed with the quality. Several people have commented on the difficulty of assembly. My son did it all but one piece on his own. The arm rest cover needed two hand to hold it tight, and a third to screw it in, otherwise simple and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good for tween/teen
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough for a tween/teen, or average sized man. Not as cushioned as some of the other reviews mentioned. The back has a 1/2 inch cut, that couldn’t be from my scissors bc it was on the bottom of the box. I don’t see this chair lasting more than maybe 2 years with moderate use so I will keep it. Very easy to assemble with an adjustable screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my grandson! He loved it, it goes perfect with all his other green Razor computer related toys!
customer_reviews.author: Mauri A Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great but for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: My ten year old son loves it!!!! He is in that chair to play video games, watch tv and even nap sometimes 10 stars!!!!! Easy to build no defects great chair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as you’d think....
customer_reviews.text: The seat took a bit longer than expected to put together. The width isn’t anything to write home about and it does feel wobbly. The weight limit is 250 and even with someone under 200, it’s not as sturdy as some say. Nice to just have for the casual usual though.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Not difficult to put together and feels sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stc2581

customer_reviews.title: Can't be beat for the price
customer_reviews.text: Took about 30 minutes to put together. Pretty comfortable and sturdy. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Miller

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, stylish, and easy to put together. It looks so sleek, definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nisha Sumasar

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable relaxing gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gaming chair mainly because it fit the colors of my Deadpool themed gaming room. It was super simple to install it comes with all of the tools and screws/bolts you need to put it together. After putting it together I sat in it and it was really comfortable I would buy it again if I had to
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: My son loves how comfortable theis chair is & it wasn’t too difficult to assemble but sadly it came with a defect/a rip in the material.
customer_reviews.author: A3rady

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chair. Bought it for my 9 year old son. Now I am buying one for myself. Some of the bolts it came with didn't quite thread in correctly but still assembled good. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Bryan De Valk

customer_reviews.title: Not enough padding
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool looking chair but needs more padding on the seat and there is no padding on the arm rests. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy-o

customer_reviews.title: Comfy gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! Sturdy and the color is rich! Same chair at an actual store was priced $198..this is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: David Barthe

customer_reviews.title: Great 1st computer chair...
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult to put together, but it's a very great chair for my 1st computer chair. I'm really enjoying the chair.
customer_reviews.author: jasmaine99

customer_reviews.title: Happy i bought it
customer_reviews.text: I was debating on a couple different chairs but im very glad i went with this one. It only took about 20 mins to put together between 2 people. We've only had it for a month but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Omg love this chair great quality all the pieces came and it was packaged great.
customer_reviews.author: Karamel

customer_reviews.title: nice chair
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable, and easy to adjust the settings, great for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Cheif Chef

customer_reviews.title: but very good value.
customer_reviews.text: Difficulty installing can cause it to lean crooked, but very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: It was a little struggle to get it together but it is a very nice product
customer_reviews.author: kolina backstrom

customer_reviews.title: Low price for a reason, comfort matters
customer_reviews.text: For the money it’s a solid chair but it’s just not comfortable for sitting long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Rig

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: Chair was good even though the box was open when it arrived
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia G Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It's far more comfortable and affordable than those tiny chairs at office max. I recommend this to gamers and office workers alike. The installation came with little to no problems. I'm no pro at installing things but it only took me 40 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming chair!
customer_reviews.text: The chair was very easy to assemble and it's very comfortable! It was a gift for my fiance and he absolutely loves it! He uses it for gaming on his pc/consoles and relaxing! Overall it's a great gaming/computer chair!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Raus

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not great, not terrible. What you would expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Never

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming Chair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 for my husband and sons, They love them and use them all the time as a gaming chair!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Emery

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable--everything I wanted in a desk chair.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the chair, it was exactly what I was looking for. It has great support and is comfortable, it is easy to move around, looks neat and is non-cumbersome. Customer service was great dealing with an issue of the chair not raising/lowering properly.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Speight

customer_reviews.title: MY WIFE LOVES THIS CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: MY WIFE TOTALLY LOVES HER CHAIR SHE ESPECIALLY LOVES THE ARMREST ON IT
customer_reviews.author: Jay M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it looks, weirdly the head pillow is slightly so far back it feels like a lounge chair (not a complaint just a observation) but it is very comfortable. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort n easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It’s was perfect for my son for his birthday. He loved it . Exactly what he wanted. Easy to assemble call. We did it together.
customer_reviews.author: Andy osorio

customer_reviews.title: Best chair to sit in
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much for the lumbar support and the neck rest
customer_reviews.author: Donna L.

customer_reviews.title: This is junk
customer_reviews.text: Chair broke with in 2 months and they wont replace
customer_reviews.author: jerry jaco

customer_reviews.title: Good chair! Feels like it sits a tad low (I’m 5”11)
customer_reviews.text: Wish the chair went up even just a couple inches higher but the chair is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: As expected and more. Honestly a good buy and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Janosch

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer error
customer_reviews.text: The screw holes on my chair that attach the back rest to the arm tests don't match up and will not assemble properly. It is like this on both sides of the chair not just one side.
customer_reviews.author: smkilmer282

customer_reviews.title: Fair price
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his chair it was easy to assemble and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband who is really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: They were very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the chairs for my sons. They were very easy to assemble. The chairs are of good quality, very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Luis A.

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs, but 4 Stars, and here's why.
customer_reviews.text: They're great chairs; I'm really happy with them. However, I ordered 2 of the same ones, and only ONE had the wheels. Thankfully, we still had our old computer chair, and bummed the wheels off of that one. But still, how did they mess that up? lol!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Konie

customer_reviews.title: ... I really needed a new chair and this was amazing! I ordered it and the next day I ...
customer_reviews.text: So for a start I really needed a new chair and this was amazing ! I ordered it and the next day I received it with normal shipping so that blew my mind. Pros: • easy to dismantle and reassemble • chair is comfortable • everything comes as advertised Cons: So for starters it was a good chair however I would have gave it 5 stars if it had...... • extendable armrest • the wheels on the chair need to be more stable rather then clipping them on because it was hard to move around the chair from place to place
customer_reviews.author: Abe

product_meta.title: Merax Office Chair Computer Gaming Desk Chair Racing Style High Back Racing Chair
product_meta.description:
Description:
This new Gaming Office Chair with a unique appearance and feel. Unlike regular office chairs, this chairs features thick soft seat cushion for extra comfort on those long working days and it has an extremely comfortable back that supports your back and neck. This chair has a high backrest to support the entirety of your spinal column. Whether you're working at high pressure, or gaming intensely. It makes you feel relaxation at working period and exciting gaming sessions. With a tubular steel frame and a nylon star base, as well as comfortable padded armrests, the chair offers superb stability.

Features:
Comfortable Arm Rests
Black Nylon Star Base
PU Leather Fabric
Adjustable height gas-spring
Integrated New Designed headrest
Conventional Tilt Mechanism
Universal casters
Adjustable seat flexibility

Notice: Items may slightly different from photo in terms of color due to the lighting during photo shooting or the monitor's display.

If you have any question of the privacy policy, including return/refund/cancel/service time,etc., please click the link below: https://www.amazon.com/sp?&seller=A3H667SN28I2I8&tab=Policies
feature_bullets: This new gaming office chair with a unique appearance and feel, with a high backrest to support the entirety of your spinal column.
Unlike regular office chairs, this chairs features thick soft seat cushion for extra comfort on those long working days and it has an extremely comfortable back that supports your back and neck.
Whether you're working at high pressure, or gaming intensely. It makes you feel relaxation at working period and exciting gaming sessions.
With a tubular steel frame and a nylon star base, as well as comfortable padded armrests, the chair offers superb stability.

Assembly is required. Our products are backed by 1 year warranty so for any reason you are not completely satisfied, our helpful, prompt and friendly Customer Service specialists are at your disposal. Customer Service Email：primeshopro@gmail.com.
